comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia for him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maurice_Chevillard

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The New York Times on November 19, 1913, reported that the daredevil pilot Maurice Chevillard had set a new aviation record by performing aerial somersaults with a passenger on board: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9405E...
